meanings.definition: Substances used to preserve food or other perishable items.
meanings.sent1: The preservatives in the jam help it stay fresh for a longer time.
meanings.sent2: I always check the labels for preservatives before buying any food.
meanings.sent3: The preservatives in the cake were like magical potions keeping it from spoiling.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking acted as a preservative, keeping the family traditions alive.
meanings.sent5: The preservatives in the paint made it last for years without fading.
